page.title: 18OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES.
page.content: GOLF:High Beech golf course has an 18 Hole putting green costing 50p and a difficult red flag or an easier yellow flag golf course costing 1 pound 50p.It employs 6 people .Club hire costs 50p. There is a pro shop at the club selling golfing goods.Loughton Golf Course is only has red flags 9-18 holes.3 people work there and it costs the same as High Beech HORSE RIDING:There are 7 riding schools around the forest reflecting the popularity of the sport.At Woodredon Fm.it costs 44 pounds for an 8 week course for children or 6 pound per 1hr. lesson.Adults can rent a horse for 13 pounds a halfday. At Pine Lodge it costs 4 pounds per hour and you can ride in the forest.
